data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Visakhapatnam, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Visakhapatnam, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Adi Andhra people.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
